alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 4:32AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Patchy Freezing Fog Developing This Morning... Patchy freezing fog has developed across portions of the North Bay early this morning. Visibility reductions to around 1/2 mile have been observed, with reductions to around 1/4 mile possible in spots. Patchy freezing fog should persist until later this morning. Motorists are advised to drive with caution as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Slick and slippery road conditions may also exist due to temperatures at or below freezing. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys
